author: taylor
msg: - allow option for registration without required email (good for demos)
- removal of all old SQL scripts
- remove Perl portlet app from both Maven-1 and Maven-2 builds and plugins
- start of new 2.1 site re-org (PSML, not completed)

author: gvanmatre
msg: Added Jakarta ORO as a pom dependency for the shale-clay-usecases.  Validator 1.3.1 has made oro optional.  The shale-clay-usecases uses the email validation rule requiring this library for server side validation.
This defect was reported by Bernhard Slominski (SHALE-407).

author: antoine
msg: adding dependency to woodstox, first as a packaged dependency
